Title: A Father's Advice
Writer: Dan Fogelman (created by), Dan Fogelman, Kay Oyegun (story editor), Jas Waters (staff writer)
Actors: Milo Ventimiglia, Mandy Moore, Sterling K. Brown, Chrissy Metz
Plot: The Big Three celebrate their 37th birthdays, and make changes in their lives; Jack and Rebecca pick up the pieces after their fight.
